short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy quick access to your favorite social, shopping, and entertainment sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Follow your favorite team like a Pro!
Jupiler Pro League - JPL-Tab.com - is an extension for the Belgian Pro league fans, offering a personalized look and feel with additional fun features:
One easy place to follow Follow the action on the team’s social streams
Stay up to date with news, scores, and special updates
Personalize your experience further with favorite shortcuts, 
Enjoy a rich search experience powered by Bing

For easy access, we recommend pinning the extension to your browser toolbar.

By clicking “ADD TO CHROME”, you accept and agree to install the Jupiler Pro League (jpl-tab.com) Chrome Extension, set the Chrome™ New Tab to jpl-tab.com, and to the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.  

The extension requests the following permissions:
- Set your new tab page search to Jupiler Pro League
- Can read and change your data on sites: 
   https://*.jpl-tab.com/* 
  
Terms of Use:  https://www.jpl-tab.com/terms-of-use 
Privacy Policy:  https://www.jpl-tab.com/privacy-policy 
 
 
You may uninstall the extension at any time.
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings.”
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions.”
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall.
